data.name: Agile Escape
data.note: You cannot perform this action while rooted
data.description: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be staggered for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Agonizing Wound
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A cruel attack to your target, which deals X physical damage. If you are behind your target, then this attack will ignore Y armor.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to corporeal resistance. Gain 169 unique bonus to elemental and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Baneful Touch
data.description: Any time you attack an enemy from the sides or rear with an action, you will gain 15 action points.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 20% of your health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Black Lotus Blade
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A deadly strike which deals X physical damage to your target and infects them with Black Lotus toxin, causing all healing that they receive for the next 10 seconds to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Blade Spin
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Blood Bomb
data.description: Throws a potion of blood on the ground which interupts enemies within 30 feet. They will take X physical damage over 6 seconds.

data.name: Broad Severing
data.description: Slice, Blood Bomb, and Sharpened Blades will now deal corporeal damage.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to strength.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Dance of Doom
data.description: You concentrate on your target, repeatedly dealing 300 damage to them for up to 3 seconds.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Death Reaper
data.description: Increases critical hit chance by 50% for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Elixir of Blades
data.description:
A powerful witch's brew which hastens your reactions for the next 7 seconds. Any time an enemy strikes you, you will deal X physical damage back to them and enemies within 20ft of them.
You cannot use another elixir for 15 seconds.

data.name: Elixir of Insane Power
data.description:
A vile brew which drives you into a rage for the next 7 seconds. All of your attacks will ignore 50% of the victim's armor.
You cannot use another elixir for 15 seconds.

data.name: Elixir of the Cauldron
data.description:
A potion filled from the legendary Cauldron Of Blood which fills you with power, increasing your chance to disrupt enemy magic by 100% for 7 seconds.
You cannot use another elixir for 15 seconds.

data.name: Enchanting Beauty
data.description: Your unearthly Elven beauty detaunts all enemies within 30 feet, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Enfeebling Strike
data.note: Requires Prowling
data.description: You ambush your target from the shadows and strike with a crippling attack. Your target will take X corporeal damage over 15 seconds Ths effect deals more damage as poison develops. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer action points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Blood Lust.

data.name: Enveloping Shadows
data.description: When leaving Shadow Prowler, you will become protected by a barrier that will absorb up to X damage

data.name: Envenomed Blade
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: You stab your enemy with a poisoned blade, dealing X physical damage. The victim becomes wracked with pains, suffering an additional Y physical damage over 9 seconds. This effect will stack with itself up to three times.

data.name: Feinted Positioning
data.description: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for 10 seconds. Does not affect morale abilities.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fleet-Footed
data.description: Your swift footwork and quick thinking removes all roots and snares from you. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Fling Poison
data.description: Deals 2285 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: For the Hag Queen!
data.description: You have a 100% chance whenever you kill an enemy and a 33% chance whenever you cast Heart Render Toxin or Puncture to reset the cooldown on Shadow Prowler. This effect cannot happen more than once every 60 seconds.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their action points into yourself, and causing them to take a 160 morale penalty to strength for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Mayhem
data.description: Whenever you use a Frenzy, your chance to critically hit is increased by 15% for 3 seconds. The duration of this eddect is increased by 1 second per Bloodlust spent.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Heart Render Toxin
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You quickly strike your target two times, dealing damage and inflicting an ailment on them for 15 seconds which causes them to take an ability penalty to wounds.
1 Blood Lust: A physical damage per hit; Wounds reduced by V.
2 Blood Lust: B physical damage per hit; Wounds reduced by W.
3 Blood Lust: C physical damage per hit; Wounds reduced by X.
4 Blood Lust: D physical damage per hit; Wounds reduced by Y.
5 Blood Lust: E physical damage per hit; Wounds reduced by Z.

data.name: Heart Seeker
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: Knocksdown your target for 3 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 609 corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Kiss of Agony
data.note: You may only have one Kiss active.
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. For the next 30 minutes, anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra X corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to take a (2 * rank) initiative penalty for the next 10 seconds. You capitalize on their momentary weakness, granting you a ability bonus to initiative for the same amount during this time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.

data.name: Kiss of Betrayal
data.note: You may only have one Kiss active.
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. For the next 30 minutes, anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra X corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to lose 10 action points. Seeing your enemy suffer causes you to gain as many action points as they have lost.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.

data.name: Kiss of Death
data.note: You may only have one Kiss active.
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. For the next 30 minutes, anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra X corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing all healing done by them to be reduced to 50% for the next 5 seconds.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.

data.name: Kiss of Doom
data.description: Kiss of Death will now heal you for the damage it deals.

data.name: Masterful Treachery
data.description: After hitting an enemy with Treacherous Assault, Vehement Blades, or Enfeebling Strike, you will deal 15% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will now hate  you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: On Your Knees!
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You spin around and strike your target with a pair of quick, punishing attacks that does damage to your target and up to 15 enemies around them.
1 Blood Lust: V corporeal damage per hit, 30 feet radius.
2 Blood Lust: W corporeal damage per hit, 35 feet radius.
3 Blood Lust: X corporeal damage per hit, 40 feet radius.
4 Blood Lust: Y corporeal damage per hit, 43.3 feet radius.
5 Blood Lust: Z corporeal damage per hit, 48.3 feet radius.

data.name: Overwhelming Dread
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet instantly lose 125 action points, and will regain action points 50% more slowly for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Pick Lock
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Pierce Armor
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A powerful stab that slices through the target's defenses, dealing X physical damage to your target and ignoring all of their armor. If the target suffers from an ailment, then you gain a (3 * rank) ability bonus to weaponskill for 10 seconds.

data.name: Potion Master
data.description: Reduces the cooldowns of all of your elixirs by 20 seconds and the cooldown of Feinted Positioning by 40 seconds.

data.name: Puncture
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You quickly stab your target twice, dealing damage and ignoring 20% armor per Blood Lust.
1 Blood Lust: V physical damage per hit
2 Blood Lust: W physical damage per hit
3 Blood Lust: X physical damage per hit
4 Blood Lust: Y physical damage per hit
5 Blood Lust: Z physical damage per hit

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 action points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Ruthless Assault
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
A relentless string of attacks which repeatedly strikes your target and all enemies within 20 feet of them up to 6 times over 3 seconds.
1 Blood Lust: V physical damage.
2 Blood Lust: W physical damage.
3 Blood Lust: X physical damage.
4 Blood Lust: Y physical damage.
5 Blood Lust: Z physical damage.

data.name: Sacrifices Rewarded
data.description:
Any time you are critically hit by a direct damage ability, you will become protected by a barrier which will absorb up to 600 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Sacrificial Stab
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You offer up your target as a sacrifice, stabbing them twice and healing yourself for all damage that you dealt. Your auto attack speed will be increased by 10%, and your enemy will be snared based by 3%, per resource point spent.
1 Blood Lust: V physical damage per hit.
2 Blood Lust: W physical damage per hit.
3 Blood Lust: X physical damage per hit.
4 Blood Lust: Y physical damage per hit.
5 Blood Lust: Z physical damage per hit.

data.name: Septic Blade
data.description: Envenomed Blade will now also reduce the victim's chance to critically hit by 10% per stack.

data.name: Sever Limb
data.note: Requires Parry
data.description: A precise crippling attack that deals X physical damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shadow Prowler
data.description:
You prowl through the shadows for the next 30 seconds, rendering you invisible to your foes unless you or they draw too close. You are less likely to be noticed when stationary, flanking your target or if you have high initiative.

This effect will slwoly drain your action points and will end if you use any abilities or run out of action points.

data.name: Sharpened Edge
data.description: Anytime an attack you make is blocked or parried, you will automatically do X physical damage to your target.

data.name: Slice
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A wide slice which deals X physical damage to enemies 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate  you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Swift Blades
data.description:
Increases your chance to parry attacks by 10%. Each time you parry an attack, you will regain 30 action points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Taste of Blood
data.description: Any time you take damage, there is a 25% chance that you will cause 15% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Throat Slitter
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A swift slice that silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds. You will also deal X physical damage to your target if you attack them from behind.

data.name: Throwing Dagger
data.description:
A quick dagger throw which deals X physical damage.
Your attack will snare the enemy if used behind your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Treacherous Assault
data.note: Requires Prowling
data.description: You leap out at your target in a maddened battle craze dealing X physical damage, immediately gaining 2 Blood Lust. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer action points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Vehement Blades
data.note: Requires Prowling
data.description: You leap out of the shadows in an insane rage. All enemies within 30ft of you take X physical damage. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Blood Lust.

data.name: Web of Shadows
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Whirling Blades
data.description: Your attacks which build blood lust will now have a 50% chance to build one additional blood lust. Treacherous Assault, Enfeebling Strike, and Vehement Blades will now generate 3 blood lust.

data.name: Witchbrew
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You consume a noxious liquid distilled from blood which fills you with power, causing your next several attacks to each deal an additional X corporeal damage to your target.
1 Blood Lust: Lasts for 2 attacks.
2 Blood Lust: Lasts for 3 attacks.
3 Blood Lust: Lasts for 4 attacks.
4 Blood Lust: Lasts for 5 attacks.
5 Blood Lust: Lasts for 6 attacks.

data.name: Wracking Pains
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A brutal attack that deals X physical damage to your target over 21 seconds. If the target is ailing, then they take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to toughness and weapon skill for 21 seconds.
